description: Transform into Prisma Pink.
Transform into Altus Aqua.
Transform into Crush Cream.

name: Crystallize Mana
description: Crystallizes mana into solid form, utilizing your innate magic to skip the process to arrive at the result.

name: Crystallize Hope
description: Crystallizes your will into a solid form suitable for repairing your magical gears.

name: Prisma Beam
description: Heart is fluttering~! Punish the evil doers! Fire a beam at at them!

name: Prisma Reversal
description: Rather than 'healing' a wound, it forces the event of being wounded to reverse. The distinction doesn't matter to you, so you just say this heals people.

name: Prisma Needler
description: Even surrounded by the enemy, your Heart burns strong! Fire, Prism Needler! Explodes several sharp projectiles in an area to slowly whittle them to size.

name: Kaleidoscope End
description: Against the overwhelming dark, shoot your blade of light through its heart! Carry your hopes and dreams, defeat the enemy in front of you!
message: By my beating Heart, by the hopes of everyone that yet live, I punish you! Kaleidoscope End!

name: Ground Frost
description: Freeze unsuspecting foes's feet to the ground. Strike their heart while they struggle in vain.

name: Freeze Barrier
description: A sheet of pure ice acting as a shield. Withstanding an assault to wait for an opening.
Conjures up numerous guns to shoot enemies around you. Ensures being surrounded only gives you more targets to shoot.

name: The World: Freeze
description: The concept of 'freezing' does not apply only to materials, but also time itself. If you were to exert your will and all your efforts, even time itself will bend to you. This is truly, your World.

name: Crush Cream Overdrive
description: A hero never gives up. Nor will they give less than 100% of their entire being. Go plus ultra with 200% of your entire being!

name: Overdrive Fatigue
description: Secondary effect of Crystallize Mana
Cream Wave destruction
im banging rocks here how does this work

name: Gun Trick Special Load
description: Crystallizes mana into special ammo. This one is particularly cheap and easy to make.

name: Gun Trick Hot Load
description: Crystallizes mana into special ammo. A hot load for a hot trick.

name: Gun Trick Blast Load
description: Crystallizes mana into special ammo. Big ammo for big roughnecks.

name: Gun Trick Last Load
description: Crystallizes mana into special ammo. The last resort and the final trick.

name: Geist Horse Call
description: A single geist is summoned

name: Create Magic Yoke
description: Creates a magical yoke pulls out the latent strength of an animal. Shows its true potential when a Geist horse is yoked.

name: Summon Moonblades
description: Summons compressed, sharp crescent blades that slice up the target.

name: Frozen Lunar Tundra
description: An attack by moonblades.

name: Blood Ignition
description: Unleash droplets of your blood in all directions and burn them. Conflagrate them as they pierce and flare your enemies.

name: Blood Ignition I
description: Unleash droplets of your blood in all directions and burn them. Conflagrate them as they pierce and flare your enemies. First part.

name: Blood Ignition II
description: Unleash droplets of your blood in all directions and burn them. Conflagrate them as they pierce and flare your enemies. Second part.

name: Blood Ignition III
description: Unleash droplets of your blood in all directions and burn them. Conflagrate them as they pierce and flare your enemies. Third part.

name: Blood Ambrosia
description: Concentrate all your ills into a single bodily part and vehemently separate it.

name: Blood Life Cradle
description: Agitate your flesh and cause it to uncontrollably erupt into a state of manic regeneration.
message: Blood Demon Art: Blood Life Cradle!

description: The puritan pain of your person shall be made preternatural.
message: False Domain Expansion: Blood Sword World!

description: Come forth, and appear before me, STAR PLATINUM!

name: NPC Star Platinum
description: The Star Platinum spell but for NPCs.

name: The World
description: Assimilate yourself into a slipstream in the timescape.

name: King Crimson
description: Assimilate others into a slipstream in the timescape.

name: King Crimson II
description: Assimilate others into a slipstream in the timescape. Second part.

name: Maiden Heaven
description: All are equal yet all are unequal.

name: Maiden Heaven II
description: All are equal yet all are unequal. Second part.

name: Maiden Heaven III
description: All are equal yet all are unequal. Third part.

name: Wonder of U
description: And that's the beauty, of, the wonder of you.

name: Limitless Void
description: A Domain that encapsulates the First Heaven of Buddhism.

name: Limitless Void II
description: A Domain that encapsulates the First Heaven of Buddhism. Second part.

name: NPC Limitless Void
description: A Domain that encapsulates the First Heaven of Buddhism. NPC version.

name: Cursed Energy Reversal
description: All the accursed shall reverse and be blest.

name: Cursed Reverberation
description: Your wounds spread all across your body, evening out the damage.

name: Cursed Blue
description: A vacuum of reality is formed, and thus all available nearby matter will flood to it to plug up the vacuum.

name: Cursed Blue II
description: A vacuum of reality is formed, and thus all available nearby matter will flood to it to plug up the vacuum. Second part.

name: Cursed Red
description: Being the antithesis of Cursed Blue, it causes an extremely powerful repulsive force, repelling all matter in its vicinity.

name: Cursed Red II
description: Being the antithesis of Cursed Blue, it causes an extremely powerful repulsive force, repelling all matter in its vicinity. Second part.

name: Cursed Purple
description: Take the amplified and the reversal, then smash together those two different expressions of infinity to create and push out imaginary mass.

name: NPC Cursed Purple
description: Take the amplified and the reversal, then smash together those two different expressions of infinity to create and push out imaginary mass. NPC version.

name: Boogie Woogie
description: A single clap may be a simple physical action, but a moment's applause is the acclimation of the soul!

name: Omnidirectional Dismantle
description: Cut a drop of blood a thousand times and you will see.
message: Inferior lifeforms, your heads are too high.

name: Omnidirectional Dismantle I
description: Cleave a drop of blood a thousand times and you will see. First part.

name: Omnidirectional Dismantle II
description: Stab a drop of blood a thousand times and you will see. Second part.

name: Omnidirectional Dismantle III
description: Scorch a drop of blood a thousand times and you will see. Third part.

name: Malevolent Shrine
description: A Domain that encapsulates the Hindu god Shiva.
Drag from the abyss a creature of terror and horror.
message: With this treasure, I summon... the Divine General, Mahoraga!

name: NPC Summon Mahoraga
description: The Summon Mahoraga spell but for NPCs.

name: Abrupt Displacement
description: Unique to Toji.
Let no door bar your passing.
Can't forget about the z-axis, can we?
A click of the heel, a genteel twirl, and a tap of the tiptoe is the secret formula.
They are falling, they just don't know it yet.
Which divides who and what for why.
Which divides who and what for why. Second Part.
Blow a kiss their way and they'll fall head over heels.

name: Where Angels Fear To Tread
description:
Who else but you shall go?
<color_light_red>Note: Never use this spell outside your line of sight as you may cast it on a tile with a creature or an impassable terrain and furniture. This may crash the game.</color>
message: The world blurs into a dull hue before bursting alight with color once more.

name: Where Angels Fear To Tread II
description: Who else but you shall go? Second part.
Luck be a lady tonight.
message: It's time to spin the wheel! Begin!

description: Luck be a lady tonight. Or not.
message: Uh oh, better luck next time!

description: Luck be a lady tonight. Or not.
Luck be a lady tonight. Or not.
Luck be a lady tonight.

name.str: Idle Gambler's Last Waltz I: Charm

description: Luck be a lady tonight. Or not.
Luck be a lady tonight.

name.str: Idle Gambler's Last Waltz II: Speed

description: Luck be a lady tonight. Or not.
Luck be a lady tonight. Ultimatum! Morale boost.
message: Three gambles in a row! JACKPOT!

name.str: Idle Gambler's Last Waltz III: Heal

description: Luck be a lady tonight. Ultimatum! Heal limbs.

name.str: Idle Gambler's Last Waltz III: Full Mana

description: Luck be a lady tonight. Ultimatum! Full mana.

name.str: Idle Gambler's Last Waltz III: No Pain

description: Luck be a lady tonight. Ultimatum! No pain.
You were perceived and struck even while immaterial. Yet you suffered naught. This unusual phenomenon may attract unwanted attention.

name: Separation of the Souls
description: The body has grown discomforted by the stifling presence of twin souls. It is necessary to deliver upon the promise of division.
message: If there is one it is not real. If there are two it lies in hope.

name: Separation of the Souls II
description: The body has grown discomforted by the stifling presence of twin souls. It is necessary to deliver upon the promise of division. Brings corpse.

name: Immaterial To Material Spell
description: A requisite for the process to work.
The preservation of both requires the sacrifice of one.
message: A breathless gasp leaks out of your lips as a part perishes to nourish the whole.

description: The preservation of both requires the sacrifice of one. Relieves pain.
The preservation of both requires the sacrifice of one. Forces sleep.

name: Becoming Human
description: The inhibitions of beasts of burden shall hinder you no more.

name: Becoming Bear
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the bear.

name: Becoming Plant
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the plant.

name: Becoming Insect
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the insect.

name: Becoming Spider
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the spider.

name: Becoming Slime
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the slime.

name: Becoming Fish
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the fish.

name: Becoming Rat
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the rat.

name: Becoming Wolf
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the wolf.

name: Becoming Cow
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the cow.

name: Becoming Cephalopod
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the cephalopod.

name: Becoming Bird
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the bird.

name: Becoming Lizard
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the lizard.

name: Becoming Prototype
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the prototype.

name: Becoming Chimera
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the chimera.

name: Becoming Fey
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the fey.

name: Becoming Mouse
description: The ancestry of life itself grants you the evolutionary pathway of the mouse.

name: Becoming Empyrean
description: The highest form of life made manifest upon this phenomenal world.
message: It is here! The preparation pristine, the sequence complete! A higher form of life, one this realm had never witnessed! Evolution Perfected!
